descriptionHtml:
If you have ever wanted a button to shut up Nazeem (The guy in Whiterun who ask about the cloud district), then this is the mod for you. Just hit the button and enjoy the show.

The button is located near his bed in The Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun.

Installation just extract the file to the Skyrim Data directory or use the Nexus Mod Manager.

To get the body to burn like in the video down load Deadly Mutilation located here:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34917/?
author: dude210002002
